title: How to Make a Tire Rocker

steps.title: Find yourself an old tire, clean it very well and measure and find it's center.
steps.content: Find yourself an old tire, clean it very well and measure and find it's center.

steps.title: Mark the center with a line using a chalk or pentel pen.
steps.content: Mark the center with a line using a chalk or pentel pen.

steps.title: Get a very sharp knife or a hacksaw and cut the tire in half using the markings you made as a guide.
steps.content: Get a very sharp knife or a hacksaw and cut the tire in half using the markings you made as a guide. Be very careful in cutting the tire in half although there are couple of ways in accomplishing this. You can use a power grinder, a knife and block but the simplest way is using a hacksaw.

steps.title: Clean the tire once more and then primer it with white paint since all tires are black.
steps.content: Clean the tire once more and then primer it with white paint since all tires are black. it is imperative that you paint it white as a primer in order for you to add your desired color to it. Paint it according your liking.

steps.title: Cut to blocks measuring the same width as the interior walls your tire, this will serve as support at the same time this is where you will mount the platform of your rocker.
steps.content: Cut to blocks measuring the same width as the interior walls your tire, this will serve as support at the same time this is where you will mount the platform of your rocker.

steps.title: Put the blocks on each side of the tire.
steps.content: Put the blocks on each side of the tire. Get some wood screw. Screw the blocks inside the screw.

steps.title: Measure the length of tire and cut a wooden plank.
steps.content: Measure the length of tire and cut a wooden plank. This will be seat of your rocker.

steps.title: Attach your platform to the blocks that you attached inside your tire.
steps.content: Attach your platform to the blocks that you attached inside your tire. Grab a fine grit sandpaper and smooth the surface

steps.title: Drill 2 holes for the rope or handles of this rocker.
steps.content: Drill 2 holes for the rope or handles of this rocker.

steps.title: Insert a rope into the holes you made the tie a knot on each end to secure it.
steps.content: Insert a rope into the holes you made the tie a knot on each end to secure it.

steps.title: Add some finishing touches.
steps.content: Add some finishing touches. You can decorate it or let your kid decorate it (safely and under supervision). When you're finished, you can let your kid enjoy their new rocker!
